overview: Going to the toilet is a perfectly natural need, but this group of horny twinks take visiting the restroom to a whole new level in their constant search for the biggest, hardest cocks around. Indeed, “cottaging” has never looked such fun as they suck and fuck to their hearts’ content – all in the knowledge that anyone could walk through the door and disturb them at any moment! With a dozen scenes and over 3 hours in length, this 2 disc classic is a must-have for all you sleazy lovers of cheap, anonymous sex!  A brilliant collection of sleazy restroom riders!
title: Sleazy Restroom Riders
